contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 4, 1979 D Hammersmith Contest (Championship)
Hammersmith Contest (Championship) 5 Test Piece Contest Hammersmith Contest hammersmith-contest-championship
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Hammersmith Town Hall, Hammersmith, Hammersmith and Fulham, Greater London, England, UK Soloist: Soprano, Foresters. Handwritten note says this was the sixth time this player had won the award.
Above order taken from British Bandsman 10/02/1979. Annotated programme has 1 and 2 points and placing the other way around.
Oct. 3, 2013, 12:25 p.m. June 9, 2014, 1:30 p.m.
1 Foresters Brass P. Wright The Judges of the Secret Court (Les Francs Juges)
2 Welwyn Garden City Band David Baron
3 Coventry Imperial Geoffrey Barber
4 Oxted R. F. Nicholson
